title: Brother charged in fatal shooting of pregnant sister
content:
Kadijah Adkinson, 22, and her fetus died from a single gunshot wound Wednesday evening in the 800 block of Guy Street.
Adkinson was pronounced dead at the hospital in Cook County around 6:50 p.m.
Adel police confirmed the suspect is Adkinson’s 14-year-old half brother who is being charged with felony murder, aggravated assault, feticide, possession of a firearm during the commission of a crime and possession of a pistol by a person under 18, reports stated.
Authorities are continuing to investigate the shooting, including the possibility that it may have been an accidental shooting.
Read more.
